code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white M retired aged 74 ys c/o 6 weeks h/o moderate epigastric pain (not checked), moderate heartburn. NKDA. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 4 years in his past he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 70 in, Weight 136 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = tender epigastric region, no distension a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

content2.Unmatched: his past he denies ever using cigarettes

td.content: s:patient complains of moderate heartburn x 4 weeks. NKDA. he is a male retired aged 74 ys. Denies ever using tobacco describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 2 years in his past o:Height 70 in, Weight 135 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = tender epigastric region, no distension a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily.

content2.Unmatched: Denies ever using tobacco describes drinking an average

td.content: s:pt complained of mild flatulence and mild diarrhea. pt denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. he is a 75 yr old white male. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 4 years in his past he does not smoke o:Height 70 in, Weight 133 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation, HEENT: WNL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Severe Indigestion p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed NEXIUM - 40 mg daily, and ordered Urea breath test.

content2.Unmatched: his past he does not smoke

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
